sourcesContent:
import {getTypeLink} from "../../../utils/helpers.js" const ColumnItem = () => { if (!Object.keys(item).length) return '' const {url, data} = item const className = parentClassName ? `${parentClassName}__item` : 'item' const type = getTypeLink(data) switch (type) { case 'email': return `
  • ${data}
    • ` case 'image': return `
    • ` default: return `
  • ${data}
    • ` } } export default ColumnItem
